QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Runed Serevite Rods
QuestData.Description:
You seem to have a magical touch, enchanter. Would you be able to help with an order I've got?
The Artisan's Consortium has requested several rods made of Serevite for a customer, but enchanting rods aren't quite my specialty.
If you're willing, Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine will compensate you for your time and effort!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver $1oa Runed Serevite Rods to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
